verbs.description: [ARG1: Walker Stapleton] [V: is] [ARG2: a cousin of George H.W. and George W. Bush] . But in Colorado 's Republican primary for governor , he 's running towards Donald Trump instead .
Walker Stapleton is a cousin of George H.W. and George W. Bush . But in Colorado 's Republican primary for governor , he [V: 's] running towards Donald Trump instead .

Walker Stapleton is a cousin of George H.W. and George W. Bush . But [ARGM-LOC: in Colorado 's Republican primary for governor] , [ARG0: he] 's [V: running] [ARG1: towards Donald Trump] [ARGM-DIS: instead] .
